data.title: Regalia Residence, Fly Me To KL

“The biggest advantage of a good service is that it saves time and effort for the customer.” By Peter Drucker...
The post Regalia Residence, Fly Me To KL appeared first on Blog.
data.text:
“The biggest advantage of a good service is that it saves time and effort for the customer.”

By Peter Drucker

VOLUME 3 BY MELD WITH JAZZ

by JESS LIM HUI JING on December 22, 2022

Welcome back, my dearest guests! Here is where we aim to provide our guests at NaiBnB , Regalia Residence. With all the information they need to have a comfortable and convenient stay with us. In this blog post, I will be focusing on the amenities available to our guests, including the top-floor restaurant, Fly Me To KL , and the incredible infinity pool.

I totally understand that it can be frustrating to navigate a new place, so we want to make it as easy as possible for our guests to find and access these amenities. I will show you the best and easiest route to get to the restaurant and pool, and introduce you to our express lane system for making reservations with no hassle.

In addition, Fly Me To KL have some exciting festive promotions and giveaways coming up, and I’ll be sharing all the juicy details with you in this blog post. So sit back, relax, and let us take care of everything while you enjoy your stay at NaiBnB, Regalia Residence.

Get to Fly Me To KL without a hitch with these directions

If you are driving,

There are two options for parking in the premises. You can park on the ground floor with touch-n-go card access, the first hour will be RM3.30 and every subsequent hour at RM1.65 without a maximum daily rate.

Alternatively, visitors can rent an RM20 whole-day parking card from the security at the 2nd-floor parking entrance. Be sure to avoid parking at the drop-off point in the lobby or in another residential’s parking lot, as both will result in your car being clamped and a fine of RM50.

Here’s how to get to G Floor and Level 2 parking!

When you exit the highway and enter the building premises, you will see two pathways. Make sure to take the left lane up to the lobby drop-off point.

If you are coming by train,

To get to Fly Me To KL by train, you can take Putra KTMB train station or PWTC RapidKL train station. From there, it’s just a 5 to 7 minutes walk to the building, Regalia Residence. Alternatively, you can catch a Grab at Sunway Putra Mall connected train station, which will drop you off just a short walk away from the restaurant. Let me show explain to you better with visual aids!

From PWTC Station,

From this station, you would need to take the crossover bridge that will take you to Sunway Putra Mall Entrance.

From Putra Station,

Exit from the station and turn LEFT.

Here, there will be a staff standing by the parking express lift to assist you to get to the 37th floor. If you haven’t met anyone staff at that moment, feel free to call this number, +6011-2819 6275 and he will come to your rescue at the lobby!

The fastest way to make a reservation!

I personally love planning my trips ahead! Making reservations can be a hassle sometimes, but it doesn’t have to be. There are a few simple steps you can follow to make the process quick and convenient.

If you’re ready to make a reservation at our restaurant, we’ve made it easy for you to do so with our online reservation system. Simply click HERE , and you’ll be taken to a secure and user-friendly platform where you can select your reservation date and time, party size, and any special requests or preferences you may have. Our online system allows you to easily compare different options and receive instant confirmation of your reservation. You can also manage your reservation from your phone or computer, making the process fast and convenient. So why wait? Book your table now and start planning your delicious dining experience!

Indulge in the Flavors of the Season with their Festive Menu Options

I am super excited to announce the launch of our festive menu, featuring a selection of delicious dishes and drinks to help you celebrate the holiday season in style. Applause to the chefs who has crafted a range of special dishes, from hearty main courses to delectable desserts, all made with the freshest ingredients and bursting with festive flavour. Whether you're looking to host a holiday dinner party, treat yourself to a special meal, or simply want to indulge in some seasonal treats, our festive menu has something for everyone. So come and join us for a memorable dining experience and let us help you get into the holiday spirit.

Escape to the Moon Bar at Sky Pool for a Festive Poolside Retreat

Slide title

Write your caption here

Button

Slide title

Write your caption here

Button

I am absolutely thrilled to announce the opening of Fly Me To KL’s pop-up bar, located on the 37th floor of Regalia Residence with a full KLCC skyline view. It is located beside the infinity pool and offers the perfect setting for a relaxed evening or special celebration. With its stunning views and sophisticated atmosphere, the bar is the perfect place to unwind and enjoy a range of delicious drinks and light bites.

The bar offers a wide selection of drinks to suit every taste and occasion. On the “Naughty List,” you’ll find a range of alcoholic beverages, including classic cocktails, punch, and an extensive selection of fun drinks. For those looking for a non-alcoholic option, our “Nice List” features a variety of mocktails, hot chocolate with a twist, and other refreshing beverages. No matter what you’re in the mood for, our skilled mixologists are on hand to craft the perfect drink for you. Please note that due to the infinity pool’s regulations, children are not allowed in the bar area. We invite everyone to come and enjoy the sophisticated atmosphere and stunning views at our bar.

Please note that this is a limited-time event and the bar will only be open from the 24th to the 25th of December. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to experience the sophistication and stunning views of our bar. Whether you’re looking to enjoy a sunset cocktail or toast to a special occasion, the bar at Regalia Residence is the ultimate destination for a festive celebration. So come and join us for an unforgettable experience and savour the beauty of the KLCC skyline from above.

Experience the Latest and Greatest with Fly Me To KL iPad Mini Insta Giveaway

Slide title

Write your caption here

Button

Slide title

Write your caption here

Button

Finally, the BEST part is to announce their Instagram photo contest giveaway for a chance to win an iPad mini! To enter, simply post a photo on Instagram and tag @flymeto_kl and join the hashtag #thisflymas. The contest period will run from 20th Dec 2022 to 3rd Jan 2023, and the winner will be announced on their Instagram page ( @flymeto_kl ) on 7th Jan 2023. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to win an iPad mini and upgrade your creativity and photography skills. I can’t wait to see your entries and good luck!
